title: How much revenue an average app can generate on Google play store? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is dependent on your application or which type of advertising like banner ,revarded video or which advertising platform you should prefer? I used Google admob . I developed a simple news application Aabhir - Android Apps on Google Play this is my first ever application I use to learn how to implement admob code on application . I tried every format for my app and my best ever estimated earn 0.9$ per day with 20 active user and 7 average click my testimonials ads. Best wishe to earn $$$$..\U0001f44d
